```{r echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)


data_1 <- diamonds
data_2 <- mpg
```

```{r}
ggplot(data_2, aes(x = displ, y = hwy, color = class)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  labs(x = "Engine Displacement (L)",
       y = "Fuel Comsumption (miles/gallon)",
       title = "Fuel Economy Data") + 
  scale_color_manual(values = c("peru", "pink", "plum", "red", "black", "blue", "green"))
```
